channel.title: My first rs private server and idk how to start running it
channel.description: I downloaded some client/server stuff from the forums but idk what to do with them and have been looking at tutorials all day and i need some help to get the server running at least. I downloaded some and in the tutorials people have like a launcher and stuff that starts the server and i cant find one, i dont know if i have the right java stuff either. I need some help with getting started on one and i can start helping people with the same problem as me and maybe become good at this stuff. Just need some basic help, but its crucial too so i can get started.

item.title: My first rs private server and idk how to start running it
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

That is what I used when I was first getting started.

Read full topic
item.source: My first rs private server and idk how to start running it
